description:
fmt: fix inadvertent change to %#v

The reordering speedup in CL 6245068 changed the semantics
of %#v by delaying the clearing of some flags.  Restore the old
semantics and add a test.

Fixes issue 3706.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0ed9cc7a16e9 ***

fmt: fix inadvertent change to %#v

The reordering speedup in CL 6245068 changed the semantics
of %#v by delaying the clearing of some flags.  Restore the old
semantics and add a test.

Fixes issue 3706.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6302048

subject: code review 6302048: fmt: fix inadvertent change to %#v
